channel.title: How do you make a server from scratch
channel.description: I'm new to this whole thing and I just wanna know how to make a server from SCRATCH. sorry if it's in the wrong place[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2008, 12:04:28 pm[/size][hr]or at least some basics on server making and all

item.title: How do you make a server from scratch
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

Blub Klub:

I’m new to this whole thing and I just wanna know how to make a server from SCRATCH. sorry if it’s in the wrong place[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2008, 12:04:28 pm[/size][hr]or at least some basics on server making and all

Learn Java, don’t look at examples from hardcoded crap on these forums.

Read full topic
